One notable option is Anker’s SOLIX F3800 Portable Power Station at $1,899 shipped, which matches its Amazon pricing right now, too. It may sport a $3,999 MSRP, but you’ll more often be able to find it down between $2,199 and $2,399 lately, with sales taking things lower, like the previously mentioned Winter Sale that dropped the cost to the $1,799 low. If you missed out on that sale, you’re getting the next-best price here while the $500 savings last ($1,900 off the MSRP). items.title: Estella’s top pet deals of the week: Up to 30% off Native Pet, up to 15% off Benebone, discounts on Swiffer, Blue buffalo, more
items.summary:
9to5Toys mascot Estella the Frenchie is back at it again, sniffing out this week’s deals and serving up some seriously solid savings. This puppy tracked down promo codes, limited-time discounts, and everyday price drops on some of the top names in pet care, making now a great time to stock up on essentials while the deals are live.

See below a 25% off promo code on Purina Pro Plan, savings on favorites like Benebone and Native Pet, plus a buy two, save 20% offer across other top pet brands. Whether you’re loading up on food, grabbing a long-lasting chew toy, or adding supplements to your pup’s routine, it’s an easy way to bundle and save in one shot.

There’s also a limited-time offer that takes $15 off when you spend $75 on household staples from brands like Swiffer, Dawn, Cascade, and Febreze. If you’re already planning a restock on pet cleaning supplies, this is a simple way to shave a little extra off the total.

As always, these deals won’t stick around forever, so you might want to fetch them while you can.
Check out even more great deals here.

Our top pet deal picks of the week:

  • Swiffer Duster Kit with 6 ft Super Extendable Handle, Heavy Duty Starter Kit with 8 Refills $20 (Save $15 when you spend $75 on select items)
  • Swiffer Pet Heavy Duty Dusters Refills, Multisurface 360 Dusters with Febreze Odor Defense, 11 Count $15 (Save $15 when you spend $75 on select items)
  • Benebone Dental Durable Dog Chew Toy for Aggressive Chewers, Real Bacon, Made in USA, Medium $12 (Orig. $14)
  • Bedsure Calming Dog Beds Large Sized Dog – 36in Donut, Washable, Anti-Slip ＆Removable Cover, Fits up to 80 lbs Pets $46 (Orig. $66)
  • Bedsure Dog Door Mat for Muddy Paws, High-Low Absorbent Chenille Indoor Entrance Mud Dirt Trapper Soak-Stopper, Machine Washable Non-Slip Entryway Rug for Pets, 30″x19″ Grey $16 (Orig. $25)
  • Purina Pro Plan Veterinary Supplements FortiFlora Daily Probiotics for Dogs, Helps Digestive Gut Health and Diarrhea – 30 ct. Box $31 (Save 25% on 1 when you buy 2 promo code: 82BA3726)
  • Purina Pro Plan Veterinary Supplements FortiFlora Daily Probiotics for Cats for Digestive Gut Health and Diarrhea – 30 ct. Box $31 (Save 25% on 1 when you buy 2 promo code: 82BA3726)
  • Purina Pro Plan Veterinary Large Breed Dog Joint Care Supplement with Glucosamine, Chondroitin, and Collagen to Support Hip and Joint Health – 30ct Pouch $20 (Save 25% on 1 when you buy 2 promo code: 82BA3726)
  • PUPIBOO Washable Pee Pads for Dogs and Cats – Super Absorbent Reusable Puppy Training Pads – 100% Waterproof, Leak-Proof & Non-Slip $26 (Orig. $35)
  • Lohhuby Automatic Cat Litter Box Self Cleaning – App Control, Open-Design, Smart Health Monitor, Suitable for Medium Cats and Kittens, Anti-Pinch Safety, Quiet Operation $149 (Orig. $200)
  • AIPERRO Stainless Steel Litter Box | XL Enclosed Cat Litter Boxes with Lid for Big Cats | High Sided, Anti-Urine Leakage | Non-Stick Bottom & Includes Litter Mat & Metal Scoop $51 (Orig. $76)
  • PETLIBRO Automatic Cat Feeder, 5G WiFi Automatic Dog Food Dispenser with Freshness Preservation, 5L Timed Pet Feeder with Low Food Sensor, Up to 10 Meals Per Day $70 (Orig. $100)
  • Royal Canin Size Health Nutrition Medium Adult Dry Dog Food, 17 lb Bag $43 (Orig. $62)
  • Buy 2, save 20% on these select items from Blue Buffalo, Purina Pro Plan, Friskies, Royal Canin and more.
  • And even more deals here…

Special shout-out to one of Estella’s favorite brands Native Pet. Native Pet is all about keeping dogs healthy with simple, clean supplements made from real, recognizable ingredients. They focus on everyday wellness—things like digestion, joints, and calm—without fillers, artificial stuff, or overcomplicated formulas. The brand feels honest and approachable, with formulas that feel straightforward, thoughtful, and easy to trust. Right now Native Pet is offering some amazing coupons and subscribe and save deals on so many of their top products. Save 20% with coupon code and 30% off with subscribe and save here.

  • Native Pet Omega 3 Fish Oil for Dogs & Cats – Promotes Healthy Skin, Shiny Coat, & Strong Joints – Made with Wild Alaskan Salmon Oil for Dogs – Tasty, Fast-Absorbing Omega 3 6 9 Liquid Supplement-16oz $21 (Orig $27)
  • Native Pet Bone Broth for Dogs – Made with Real Beef Bone Broth, Dog Food Toppers for Picky Eaters – Provides Extra Hydration & Nutrition for Joint Strength, Immunity & Heart Health-48 Scoops $16 (Orig. $20)

items.title: Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 for Switch just hit its best price ever on Amazon, more
items.summary:
While we are still tracking a host of ongoing Presidents Day Switch game deals at Amazon and elsewhere live down below, Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 has just hit its best price ever on Amazon as of this morning. Regularly $70, you can now land proper U.S. physical copy of this one for Switch library down at $59 shipped – this deal is also live at Walmart now as well. While we have been tracking this same price over at Woot for a U.S. copy, this is the first time we have tracked the game down this low directly on Amazon. Head below for more hangover Presidents Day game deals.

items.title: Don’t miss Alienware’s 18-inch Area-51 RTX 5070 300Hz gaming laptop while it’s $600 off today
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Alienware’s Area-51 18-inch gaming laptop with an RTX 5070 GPU down to $2,349.99 shipped. That’s a straight $600 off its $2,950 usual going rate, making this one of the lowest prices we’ve tracked so far. It’s only dipped lower once before, and today’s deal is just $50 shy of that all-time low. It’s an easy recommendation at this price, and it’s a particularly good deal considering Dell is currently charging the same $2,350 for a lower-spec variant with an Ultra 7 processor and RTX 5060 GPU at its online store. There’s plenty to like about this machine, and you can learn more about it in detail below.
